Writer: Robert Hamner (characters), Ron Mita (story), Jim McClain (story), David Ayer (screenplay), David McKenna (screenplay)
Title: S.W.A.T.
Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Colin Farrell, Michelle Rodriguez, LL Cool J
Plot: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.
